name: Cinnabar
info: A Sinner adept at defending. Can block 2 enemies at the same time and increase Shield Efficiency by 10%

media.title: JP Cinnabar Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

maniaIntensifyText: The generated shield gains an additional effect: While the shield lasts, damage dealt to the shielded unit is reduced by 5%.
criminalRecord:
Used to work as a security supervisor in the renowned security company //Serpent Eye//, the subject betrayed others' trust in her and left her duties without permission, exposing important officials to danger and leading to a catastrophic security breach.

While on the run, the subject repeatedly resisted arrest by the Public Security Bureau with the help of several accomplices and was included on the most wanted list.

--

In her detention, the subject demonstrates a strong conscience and protective instinct, contrary to previous records. Interrogation and investigation reveal that although the subject indeed left her duties without permission on the day her power awakened, she did that to protect innocent citizens from the terrorist attack. It's believed that her protective instinct possibly awakened her power. On her MBCC missions, the subject has shown undeniable professionalism in the security domain and a strong sense of responsibility.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Able to charge the portable customized barrier generator at will. The special power shield it releases can ward off most physical or energy attacks.


+++* Awakening Signs
The subject has taken Serpent Eye's strict onboarding physical examination before and no latent infection symptoms have been detected. It can be confirmed that the subject had the first awakening when fighting terrorists on a mission to protect officials.

+++* Corruption State
No signs of Mania corruption detected. Possesses excellent fighting, shooting and counter-surveillance skills. The inborn high intelligence and physical strength give the subject higher resistance to corruption than normal people.
ecbFlavourText:
"This is dereliction of duty on your part!"
"If my duty requires me to disregard life, then I'd rather not have it."
interrogation1:
The Chief receives a call from the head of Serpent Eye, a man named Alyosha, who requests that Cinnabar be temporarily released to be the bodyguard for the Deputy Speaker [[[Reagan]]] after his recently-received death threats. Later, in the interrogation room (and after some teasing about her being an androgynous heart-throb), the Chief inquires about the reason that Cinnabar was fired. She explains that while being tasked with protecting a delegation, she caught sight of and subsequently stopped a gang from raiding a civilian block. Despite saving many lives in the process, she was branded as a criminal for deserting her squadmates and going against orders. She harbors intense guilt about letting Serpent Eye down in a critical moment, feeling that she has irreversibly broken their trust. The Chief informs her about Alyosha's call and the reasons behind his application for requisition. At the mention of his name, she lights up, asking further questions about the details of the mission. The Chief explains and Cinnabar immediately comes up with the optimal countermeasures, but her mood darkens once again after her excitement subsides. The Chief reassures her that despite her actions, Serpent Eye still has their contract with Eastside and the city council. They also insist that Cinnabar's colleagues don't hold any grudges against her, citing that Alyosha himself vouched for her capabilities. This gives her the boost of confidence she needs to accept the mission -- even knowing that the Chief has to accompany her.

The interrogation went surprisingly well. Finally, you have a rough idea of Cinnabar's past. The security operation is taking place next week. Both you and Cinnabar must get ready.
interrogation2:
Shortly after the Chief rescues Cinnabar from being hit on by yet another woman, Alyosha meets the two of them in person. The atmosphere is tense as they go over their status, and Alyosha informs Cinnabar that Reagan's five VIPs aren't going to be subjected to a security check. After Reagan gives his speech, he invites the VIPs on stage to award them for assisting in his Home Reconstruction Project, an effort designed to create housing for displaced Syndicans. Despite being from Syndicate herself, Cinnabar doesn't recognize any of them, nor does she recall hearing of such a project; in fact, she remembers a much different story: a high death toll in the collapse of a poorly-constructed housing development. Putting the pieces together, she springs into action, but one of the VIPs handcuffs himself to Reagan before she can reach him. The man announces nervously that he has a bomb strapped to his chest, and chaos ensues in the venue. Via a speaker on the man's neck, the perpetrator demands that Reagan compensate the victims of the aforementioned disaster. Reagan remains calm, and after Cinnabar radios Serpent Eye to deploy their EMP, she subdues the would-be attacker, a teenage boy nearby equipped with a tablet and detonator. When the lights come back on, Alyosha removes the handcuffs on Reagan's wrist. Reagan then calmly takes Alyosha's gun from its holster and shoots his VIP dead. Reagan coldly rebukes Alyosha's performance before turning to leave. On his way out, he calls Cinnabar "a filthy street rat", and the attacker screams at him, promising vengeance for what he did to Syndicate. Alyosha moves to kill the attacker, saying that it's part of the client's orders, but Cinnabar protects the boy instead. The Chief and Cinnabar stand up for each other in the face of Alyosha's growing rage, and though Alyosha eventually relents, he does so only after reopening Cinnabar's wounded pride. The Chief makes a final attempt to mend their strained connection, and although Alyosha stops to consider it, he and the rest of Serpent Eye leave without saying a word. With the room now empty except for the two of them, Cinnabar breaks down crying, and the two embrace.

No one expected that this would end up like this. Though only a few were injured on site and the attacker was captured, it is still a troubling issue how Cinnabar went on their separate ways. Perhaps you should do something about it.
interrogation3:
Two months later, Cinnabar and the Chief discuss the difficulty of getting a search warrant for Reagan. Cinnabar fears for Serpent Eye's safety, but it isn't until a few days later that Alyosha finally returns their calls. He informs them that Serpent Eye no longer works for the City Council, but that it wasn't Cinnabar's fault. He offers to meet her. The Chief accompanies her to a bar on the border between Eastside and Syndicate, where she explains that her father and Alyosha helped found Serpent Eye thirty years prior. Despite the uneasy way they last parted, Serpent Eye welcomes her with open arms, extending their kindness to the Chief as well. They fondly discuss the past, and Cinnabar says regardless of the paths she's taken in life, Serpent Eye will always be her home. Alyosha, who'd been drinking silently in the corner until now, drunkenly interrupts, decrying the MBCC and criticizing Cinnabar for choosing to be a prisoner instead of rejoining them. Cinnabar stands up for herself and her choices, promising him that she could never forget the values and lessons that he and everyone in Serpent Eye have taught her, including instilling her with desire to protect others. Alyosha asks her if she considers the Chief, who he views as her captor and slavedriver, to be someone worth protecting. She does, saying that not only is the Chief important to her, but that it's been her choice to stay in the MBCC. Stunned into silence, Alyosha returns to his corner, and as the other Serpent Eye members encourage him to let it go, he passes out finishing his vodka. After insinuating that the Chief and Cinnabar are somehow involved, the veterans attempt to get the Chief drunk. Cinnabar intervenes, proposing a toast instead. This snowballs into a drinking contest that Cinnabar wins with ease. As she attempts to leave with the Chief, Alyosha stops them at the door, giving the Chief a firm pat on the shoulder. Seeing him finally accept them, the rest of Serpent Eye cheer, and Cinnabar smiles at her now-growing found family.

Right before you part ways, you and the people of Serpent Eye exchanged your business cards. They promised to keep in touch with you and Cinnabar. You saw a happy smile on Cinnabar's face. And that is all that matters.
arrestRec1: During the period the subject was wanted, she used an alias and hid in Syndicate, working as a mercenary. After her Sinner identity was exposed, to avoid affecting her comrades, the subject let herself be arrested by the MBCC.
arrestRec2: According to the résumé provided by //Serpent Eye//, during the subject's tenure, she successfully prevented multiple attacks, made impressive achievements, and received excellent comments.
arrestRec3: At the scene of the officials' attack, the subject didn't merely leave the clients unprotected, but had instead made careful escorting arrangements before going back alone to fight the terrorists in an attempt to save the civilians. The truth behind the crime of AWOL has to be further determined.
arrestRec4: Cinnabar's father was one of the founding members of //Serpent Eye//. After her father died on a mission, the subject was raised with the financial support and care from her father's former comrades. Having graduated with distinction from the police academy, the subject chose to join //Serpent Eye//.
servingTerm1: Having grown up around mercenaries, the subject knows nothing about the common topics among girls. But she's never been pushed aside for this, or rather, she's extremely popular among female Sinners because of her handsome appearance.
servingTerm2: The subject has a regular schedule, and a healthy diet and no bad habits; and she has few other activities other than daily training and maintenance of her weapons and equipment. Other Sinners have made such comments about her: "So normal that she's a bit uninteresting."
servingTerm3: //Protecting others// has been an unconscious occupational habit of the subject's, but as the women in the Bureau begin to purposely fall down before her more and more often, the situation is becoming quite a headache for the subject.
servingTerm4: The subject spent a month on mental preparation in order to address the Chief by name. One week before the scheduled date, the subject even submitted a written application with a copy to the Chief's office.
emotionCheck1:
[Now that the mission is over, Cinnabar seems to be thinking about something.]

**Cinnabar:** Sigh. My past experience doesn't work so well here in the Bureau.

* **Prompt:** The battle here is too challenging?
 * **Cinnabar:** Don't you underestimate me. I was once the leader of Serpent Eye.
 * **Cinnabar:** 😦

* **Prompt:** It's very different from the experience with the Serpent Eye?
 * **Cinnabar:** Well, communication is so very hard.
 * **Cinnabar:** 😐
emotionCheck2:
[You walk past Cinnabar's detention room.]

**Cinnabar:** Do you need me as your bodyguard today?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Sure, but you should watch yourself as well.
 * **Cinnabar:** No problem. I'll be waiting for your order.
 * **Cinnabar:** 😘

* **Prompt:** The mission this time isn't too difficult. You can take a break now.
 * **Cinnabar:** You said the same thing last time.
 * **Cinnabar:** 😓
supervision1:
++* ⚠ That can be sold too?

//Something seems to be troubling Cinnabar lately.//

**System Notifications:** Cinnabar has been receiving a lot of harassment letters from her extreme fans. It is now causing her too much trouble.

**System Notifications:** She asked you to get rid of those letters.

* **Prompt:** Add it to the collection
* **Prompt:** Sell it as scrap paper
supervision2:
++* ⚠ The Job of a Bodyguard

//You received an external message.//

**System Notifications:** A merchant in Eastside is being hunted these days. She begs you to hire a reliable bodyguard for her. A bodyguard such as Cinnabar.

**System Notifications:** She promises to pay you first.

* **Prompt:** Approve
 * **System Notifications:** After you received the payment, you lost contact with that merchant.

* **Prompt:** Reject
 * **System Notifications:** Later on, you heard that the merchant had completely vanished.
supervision3:
++* ⚠ Push-Up

//Cinnabar wins in a push-up contest with staff members.//

**System Notifications:** In a push-up contest with staff members, Cinnabar wins by a narrow margin of five push-ups.

* **Prompt:** Express confusion

**Chief:** Why just five?

**Cinnabar:** To keep the contest fair, I only used one arm for the push-ups.

**Cinnabar:** Besides... I didn't want to embarrass my opponent by winning by too much.

**Chief:** I see.
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Flavor Preference

//Cinnabar is eating in the Outdoor Activity Area.//

**System Notifications:** Cinnabar has already eaten a lot of stuff, but it seems she can keep going...

* **Prompt:** Greet

**Chief:** Cinnabar, I didn't expect you had such a great appetite.

**Cinnabar:** Eating is just as important as training when it comes to maintaining strong physiques.

**Chief:** Do you have any preferences?

**Cinnabar:** Preferences? I always eat a lot of meat to ensure that I ingest enough protein.

**Cinnabar:** Of course, I also need carbohydrates and vitamins.

* **Prompt:** What specific food are you into?

**Cinnabar:** Huh? My preferences...?

**Cinnabar:** I don't like any particular food. So long as it's a well-prepared dish, I'll happily eat it.
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠ Warmup Exercise

//Cinnabar is practicing in the Training Room.//

**System Notifications:** Cinnabar is practicing in the Training Room.

* **Prompt:** Cinnabar, have you come for some training?

**Cinnabar:** Yes.

**Cinnabar:** I'm going to train my marksmanship and physical strength today. Would you like to join me, Chief?

* **Prompt:** Agree

**Chief:** Well, it's time to get some exercise. At least this way, my physical strength can keep up with the others.

**Cinnabar:** First, we need to do some warm-ups. I did this routine set every day back when I was in Serpent Eye.

**Cinnabar:** Follow my lead. If you don't do warm-ups, you can easily get hurt during the workout.

**System Notifications:** The Chief tried to do the warm-up, but then...

**Cinnabar:** Chief, what happened?

**Cinnabar:** Are you alright? Here. Take a seat.

* **Prompt:** Inform of the situation

**Chief:** ...I think I cramped my leg. Perhaps your so-called warm-up is already too intense for me...

**Cinnabar:** You should get some rest.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Cinnabar, former supervisor of the private military company Serpent Eye. Anything concerning security, I should be of help.

[Raise to Phase 1]
So this is how you hone your abilities... Sinners sure are special.

[Raise to Phase 3]
No more necessary sacrifices. This power will protect everyone.

[Level Start]
Stay behind me.

[Win Battles]
Rest assured, we're safe now.

[Lose Battles]
I'll hold them off, you get out of here now. Run!

[Ultimate Skill]
I'll protect them!

[Die in Battles]
No... Not yet, not when they're still here...

[Greeting]
Welcome back, Chief. There have been no irregular activities in the Bureau while you were away.

[Conversation 1]
As of now, I have a 100% assignment completion rate. You may rest assured that I will keep you safe.

[Conversation 2]
My seniors at Serpent Eye are the best teachers I've ever had. The things they've taught me are way more useful than the //professional knowledge// taught in the police academy.

[Conversation 3]
This is a GH-2 Shield Generator, custom-made high-end stuff from the Research Institute, very reliable. One thing though, it's got a ton of parts inside, hence a real pain to repair.

[Special Conversation 1]
I was once lost too, about what I should protect. But after that incident, I've found my answer.

[Special Conversation 2]
In the past, besides protecting the big shots of Paradeisos, I often did safety assessment for large organizations. As for MBCC... things are more complicated. My previous experience is not quite applicable here.

[Special Conversation 3]
I've never protected anyone over such a long period. It's like I'm your personal bodyguard. But well... I do like this job.

[Full Compliance]
Ever since leaving Serpent Eye, I haven't met any comrades I can count on in a long time... It is my honor to fight beside you.

[Idle]
Hmm... Where did I put my bulletproof plate?

[Annoyed]
Please keep an appropriate distance... I can't perform my tasks properly if you do that.

[Special Attention]
Do you need close protection? Understood.

[Dispatch]
No problem. I'll get it done in no time.

[Dispatch Complete]
Mission accomplished. Hit me up whenever you need me.

[Level Up]
Security leveled up.
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
It's an honor to take part in this escort mission to the Rust. I've been looking forward to spending more time with you... Sorry...  I... I just wanted you to know how happy I am.

[Greeting]
There you are, Chief. Everything is ready. We can go now.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Please tell me if you're tired. Don't worry,. I'll clear a safe resting area for you.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Be careful! Rockfalls and landslides are common around the Rust. Please stay close to me.

[Idle] 
Get some rest, Chief. No matter how long you need, I'll be by your side.

[Annoyed]
You seem out of breath. Did you notice anything unusual?

[Special Attention] 
The Rust is indeed dangerous. But don't worry, I won't let any harm come to you—It's my duty.

[Level Up}
Guard Power increased.
attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
Traveling by horse might seem a bit... too much, but it's a gesture from Miss Faye. She insisted we uphold the prestige of the MBCC... I can't just disregard her kind intentions.

[Greeting]
It's time, Chief. I'm here to escort you to the party. Tonight, I'm the knight only for you.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Would you like to pet him? It's okay, he's a gentle boy. Here, try riding him. Don't worry, I'll protect you.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
This look sacrifices a bit of functionality for aesthetics and does look a bit constricted and cumbersome... But rest assured I will make sure you are unscathed no matter what happens.

[Idle] 
Shh, easy there... Are you feeling thirsty?

[Annoyed]
Ahem... Please don't mess up these decorations. It's a little time-consuming to wear them. After the party is over, I will take them off and give them to you, you can examine them however you want.

[Special Attention] 
This outfit suits me? Thanks... I'm glad to know you like it.

[Level Up}
I've been honing my horsemanship. It won't be a bumpy ride, I promise.
nightmareTalent: For each battle won, all allied units gain a 2.5% boost of the Shield they receive. The boost is capped at 25%.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: The Meaning of Guard
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When [Pressure Shield] is triggered, all allies on the battlefield will gain a Shield equaling to 50% / 60% / 70% of [Pressure Shield]
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"This is dereliction of duty on your part!"
"If my duty requires me to disregard life, then I'd rather not have it."

maniaIntensify.title: Deploy Barrier
maniaIntensify.text: The generated shield gains an additional effect: While the shield lasts, damage dealt to the shielded unit is reduced by 5%.

crimebrandSets.name: Tanky
crimebrandSets.note: Standard build for tankiness, increasing block and defense.

shackles.title: Will to Protect
shackles.description: [Wall of Sighs]: No longer limited to being centered around self, but can used on any grid.

shackles.title: Pressure Feedback
shackles.description: Using [Wall of Sighs] refreshes [Pressure Shield's] cooldown.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Kick
skills.description: Cinnabar uses skilled combat techniques to attack. The 1st attack: She kicks, dealing (Attack*104%) Physical Damage. The 2nd attack: She kicks, then strikes with her shield, each hit dealing (Attack*62%) Physical Damage.

upgrade.description: The damage of the $0st attack is increased to $0% ; The damage of the $0nd attack is increased to $0%.

skills.name: Wall of Sighs
skills.description: Cinnabar deploys a barrier over a 3x3 square around her, granting her allies a (2.5% of Cinnabar's Max HP) shield per second. The shield lasts 7 seconds. [Wall of Sighs] lasts 8 seconds, during which Cinnabar blocks 2 fewer enemies, and any action she makes interrupts the effect. When [Wall of Sighs] is in effect, Cinnabar can't automatically restore her energy.

upgrade.description: Shield gain per second increased to $0%.

skills.name: Pressure Shield
skills.description: Before taking damage, Cinnabar gains a (Max HP*12%) shield for 5 seconds. This effect can be triggered once every 25 seconds.

skills.name: Comprehensive Field
skills.description: At the start of the battle, all allies gain a 10% shield efficiency bonus.

compliance: Unlocke File: Monitor Record, Life +79, Magic Resistance +8
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Life + 79, Magic Resistance + 8
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Complete Cinnabar's Review
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term Unlock Sticker
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Wall of Snake Eyes
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Sweet Burden

//Cinnabar always receives sweets and gifts from some Sinners and staff.//

**System Notifications:** Cinnabar keeps pacing near you, looking like she has something to say.

* **Prompt:** Is something the matter?

**Cinnabar:** Chief, in fact, I have a request, it's kind of awkward.

**Cinnabar:** Could you... I...

**System Notifications:** Cinnabar seems to be hesitating still.

* **Prompt:** You can say it.

**Cinnabar:** What happens is this. I always receive sweets and snacks from some people... more than I can count.

**System Notifications:** Cinnabar blushes slightly after she says that.

**Cinnabar:** I know they're being nice, so I can't just throw them away. But my daily training and diet routines don't allow such a high sugar intake.

**Cinnabar:** My room is almost exploding with these sweets and snacks now. Chief, could you please help me solve this problem?

**System Notifications:** Cinnabar is waiting for your response a little nervously.

* **Prompt:** I'll eat them.
 * **System Notifications:** A Sinner under you is in trouble. You decide to take responsibility and handle these excess sweets personally.
 * **System Notifications:** Eventually, you're forced to join the Bureau's health management course for being overweight.
 * **Chief:** It's all for Cinnabar! Burp.

* **Prompt:** Give them to children
 * **System Notifications:** You decide to give these sweets and snacks away to children in Syndicate.
 * **Cinnabar:** Really? Chief, this is an excellent solution! They must be overjoyed!
 * **Chief:** I'm just doing what I should do.

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: Cinnabar, former supervisor of the private military company Serpent Eye. Anything concerning security, I should be of help.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: 軍事企業「スネークアイ」の元責任者である辰砂です。セキュリティ関係のことなら、お力になれると思います。
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 시나바, 전 군사 청부업자 '스네이크 아이즈'의 책임자입니다. 보안에 관한 일이라면 제가 도움이 되어줄 수 있을 겁니다.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 辰砂，前军事承包商“蛇眼”的负责人。涉及安全方面的工作，我应该能提供些帮助。
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 辰砂，前軍事承包商「蛇眼」的負責人。涉及安全方面的工作，我應該能提供些幫助。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: So this is how you hone your abilities... Sinners sure are special.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: これで作戦能力を上げられるとは、コンビクトというのは……特別な存在ですね。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - KR: 이렇게 하면 작전 능력이 올라가는군요. 수감자라니… 특별하군요.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 原来这样就能提升作战能力，禁闭者这种……还真是特别。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 原來這樣就能提升作戰能力，禁閉者這種……還真是特別。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: No more necessary sacrifices. This power will protect everyone.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: もう「必要な犠牲」が出なくても済むように、この力でみんなを守ります。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 어쩔 수 없는 희생'이란 것은 더 이상 없을 것입니다. 이 힘은 모든 사람을 지켜낼 것입니다.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 再不会有所谓“必要的牺牲”了，这份力量将守护所有人。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 再不會有所謂「必要的犧牲」了，這份力量將守護所有人。
voicelines.Level Start - JP: わたしについてきてください。
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: 大丈夫です。すべての危険は排除しました。
voicelines.Win Battles - CN: 放心吧，已经没有危险了
voicelines.Win Battles - TW: 放心吧，已經沒有危險了
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: I'll hold them off, you get out of here now. Run!
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: 後は私に任せて、局長は撤退してください。早く！
voicelines.Lose Battles - KR: 제가 막고 있을 테니, 얼른 이곳을 떠나십시오! 빨리요.
voicelines.Lose Battles - CN: 我断后，你快离开这儿，快！
voicelines.Die in Battles - EN: No... Not yet, not when they're still here...
voicelines.Die in Battles - JP: いえ……ダメです。まだみんなが……。
voicelines.Die in Battles - KR: 안돼… 아직은 안된다고, 아직 그들이 저기에…
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Welcome back, Chief. There have been no irregular activities in the Bureau while you were away.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: おかえりなさい、局長。局長がいない間、局内に異常は見られませんでした。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 다녀오셨습니까, 국장님. 국장님이 안 계시는 동안 보안국에는 별다른 이상이 없었습니다.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 欢迎回来，局长。您不在的这段时间，局里没有发生什么异常状况。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 歡迎回來，局長。您不在的這段時間，局裡沒有發生什麼異常狀況。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: As of now, I have a 100% assignment completion rate. You may rest assured that I will keep you safe.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: 今のところ、依頼の達成率は100％です。だから安心してください。私が必ず局長を守ります。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 지금까지 저의 위탁 완료율은 100%입니다. 그러니 안심하세요, 제가 당신의 안전을 책임지고 지켜드리겠습니다.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 截至目前，我的委托完成率还是百分之百。所以，请放心，我会保护好您的安全。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 截至目前，我的委託完成率還是百分之百。所以，請放心，我會保護好您的安全。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: My seniors at Serpent Eye are the best teachers I've ever had. The things they've taught me are way more useful than the professional knowledge taught in the police academy.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 私にとって、スネークアイの先輩たちは一番の先生でした。先輩たちが教えてくれたことは警察学校で学んだ「専門知識」より役に立ちますからね。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 저에게 있어 스네이크 아이즈의 선배들은 최고의 스승이었습니다. 그들이 가르쳐 준 것은 경찰 대학의 '전문지식'보다도 훨씬 유용했죠.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 对我而言，蛇眼的前辈们是最好的老师。他们教给我的东西，比警官学院的“专业知识”更加有用。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 對我而言，蛇眼的前輩們是最好的老師。他們教給我的東西，比警官學院的「專業知識」更加有用。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: This is a GH-2 Shield Generator, custom-made high-end stuff from the Research Institute, very reliable. One thing though, it's got a ton of parts inside, hence a real pain to repair.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: これは「GH-2」型シールドジェネレータです。研究所が特注した優れモノで、かなり性能が安定しています。ただ、内部のパーツが多いため、メンテナンスが少し大変ですね。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 이건 'GH-2'형 방패 발생기로, 링 연구소가 주문 제작한 프리미엄급 제품이라 매우 믿음직스럽습니다. 다만, 내부 부품이 너무 많아 유지하기가 좀 번거롭다는 게 흠이죠.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 这是“GH-2”型护盾发生器，中央研究院订制的高端货，非常可靠。只不过，它的内部零件很多，维护起来有些麻烦。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 這是「GH-2」型護盾發生器，中央研究院訂製的高級貨，非常可靠。只不過，它的內部零件很多，維護起來有些麻煩。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: I was once lost too, about what I should protect, and how to do it. But after that incident, I've found my answer.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 何を、どうやって守るのか、私も悩んだ時期がありました。でもあの事件の後、答えを見つけました。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 무엇을 지켜야 할지, 또, 어떻게 지켜야 할지… 막막했었습니다. 그러나 그 일을 통해 나는 답을 찾았습니다.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 我也曾迷茫过，该守护什么，又该如何守护。但经过那件事，我找到了答案。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 我也曾迷茫過，該守護什麼，又該如何守護。但經過那件事，我找到了答案。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: In the past, besides protecting the big shots of Paradeisos, I often did safety assessment for large organizations. As for MBCC... things are more complicated. My previous experience is not quite applicable here.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 上庭での要人のボディーガードを除けば、様々な組織で安全評価も行ってきました。でもMBCCの場合……状況が複雑で、昔の経験は通用しないようです。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 과거에는 낙원 요원 보호뿐 아니라, 여러 기관의 안전 점검을 자주 해야 했습니다. 하지만 MBCC는… 상황이 좀 복잡합니다. 그간의 경험은 여기서 잘 적용되지 않습니다.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 过去，除了保护上庭要员，我还经常要给各大机构做安全评估。但是MBCC……情况有点复杂，以往的经验在这里都不太适用。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 過去，除了保護上庭要員，我還經常要給各大機構做安全評估。但是MBCC……情況有點複雜，以往的經驗在這裡都不太適用。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: I've never protected anyone over such a long period. It's like I'm your personal bodyguard. But well... I do like this job.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: これまでにここまで長時間、誰か一人を守ったことはありませんでした。まるで局長専属のボディーガードみたいですね。ふふ……こういう仕事も好きですよ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 저는 지금껏 이렇게 오랜 시간 한 사람만을 보호한 적이 없습니다. 마치 개인 보디가드처럼… 하지만… 저는 이 일이 좋습니다.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 我从来没有这么长时间地保护一个人，就像是你的私人保镖一样。不过……我喜欢这份工作。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 我從來沒有這麼長時間地保護一個人，就像是你的私人保鏢一樣。不過……我喜歡這份工作。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: Ever since leaving Serpent Eye, I haven't met any comrades I can count on in a long time... It is my honor to fight beside you.
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: スネークアイを出てから、背中を預けられるような戦友に出会えたのは久しぶりのことです……局長と一緒に戦うことができて、光栄です。
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 스네이크 아이즈를 떠난 뒤, 꽤 오랫동안 등을 맡길 수 있는 전우를 만나지 못했습니다… 당신과 함께 싸울 수 있게 되어 영광입니다.
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 自从离开蛇眼之后，我已经很久没有遇到过可以托付后背的战友了……能和您一起战斗，是我的荣幸。
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 自從離開蛇眼之後，我已經很久沒有遇到過可以託付後背的戰友了……能和您一起戰鬥，是我的榮幸。
voicelines.Idle - EN: Hmm... Where did I put my bulletproof plate?
voicelines.Idle - JP: うーん……おかしいな。防弾プレートはどこだ？
voicelines.Idle - KR: 음… 이상하네, 방탄 플러그를 어디에다 두었지?
voicelines.Idle - CN: 嗯……奇怪，防弹插板放哪儿去了？
voicelines.Idle - TW: 嗯……奇怪，抗彈板放哪裡去了？
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Please keep an appropriate distance... I can't perform my tasks properly if you do that.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 一定の距離を保ってください……これでは仕事に支障がでます。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 적당한 거리 유지를 부탁드립니다… 이래서는 제가 제대로 직무를 수행할 수가 없습니다.
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 请保持适当的距离……您这样我无法正常履行职责。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 請保持適當的距離……您這樣我無法正常履行職責。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Do you need close protection? Understood.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 身辺警護が必要ですか？分かりました。
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 需要贴身保护么？我明白了。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 需要貼身保護嗎？我明白了。
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: No problem. I'll get it done in no time.
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: わかりました。できるだけ早く任務を遂行します。
voicelines.Dispatch - KR: 문제없습니다. 최대한 빠르게 임무를 마치고 복귀하겠습니다.
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 没问题，我会尽快完成任务。
voicelines.Dispatch - TW: 沒問題，我會儘快完成任務。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: Mission accomplished. Hit me up whenever you need me.
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: 任務完了です。必要な時はいつでもお呼びください。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 임무를 완수했습니다. 제가 필요하시면 언제든지 불러주십시오.
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 任务完成了，有需要的话随时都可以找我。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 任務完成了，有需要的話隨時都可以找我。
voicelines.Level Up - JP: セキュリティレベルがアップしました。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: It's an honor to take part in this escort mission to the Rust. I've been looking forward to spending more time with you... Sorry... I... I just wanted you to know how happy I am.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 錆の川の護衛任務に参加できて光栄です。もっと局長と一緒に過ごしたいと思っていたので……す、すみません……嬉しいと伝えたかっただけです。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 러스트 리버 작전의 호위 임무에 참여할 수 있게 되어서 영광입니다. 줄곧 국장님과 더 많은 시간을 보낼 수 있기를 기대하고 있었습니다… 죄송합니다… 그, 그저 아주 기쁘다는 말씀을 드리고 싶었을 뿐입니다.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 很荣幸能够参与锈河行动的护卫任务，我也一直期待能够多一些与您相处的时间……抱歉……我，我只是想告诉您，我很开心。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 很榮幸能夠參與鏽河行動的護衛任務，我也一直期待能夠多一些與您相處的時間……抱歉……我，我只是想告訴您，我很開心。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: There you are, Chief. Everything is ready. We can go now.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 来ましたか、局長。準備は万全です。出発しましょう。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 국장님, 오셨습니까. 모든 준비는 끝났으니 이제 출발해도 됩니다.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 您来了，局长。所有事项都已准备就绪，我们可以出发了。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 您來了，局長。所有事項都已準備就緒，我們可以出發了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Please tell me if you're tired. Don't worry. I'll clear a safe resting area for you.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 疲れたらいつでも言ってください。あなたのために安全な場所を確保しますので、ご安心を。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 힘드시다면 언제든 말씀해 주세요. 안심하세요. 제가 국장님을 위해 안전 구역을 만들어내겠습니다.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 如果觉得累了，您随时都可以告诉我。请放心，我会为您清理出一片安全区域的。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 如果覺得累了，您隨時都可以告訴我。請放心，我會為您清理出一片安全區域的。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Be careful! Rockfalls and landslides are common around the Rust. Please stay close to me.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: 危ない！錆の川では、落石と地盤沈下が多発しています。なるべく私のそばにいてください。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 조심하세요! 러스트 리버에는 낙석과 지반 붕괴가 많이 일어납니다. 최대한 저에게 붙어 계세요.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 小心！锈河的落石、地面塌陷状况很多。请您尽可能靠近我一些。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 小心！鏽河的落石、地面塌陷狀況很多。請您盡可能靠近我一些。
voicelines.Idle - EN: Get some rest, Chief. No matter how long you need, I'll be by your side.
voicelines.Idle - JP: ゆっくり休んでください、局長。どれだけ時間が経っても、私はあなたのそばにいます。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 푹 쉬세요, 국장님. 아무리 오랜 시간이 지나더라도 저는 언제나 당신 곁을 지키겠습니다.
voicelines.Idle - CN: 好好休息，局长。无论过去多久，我都会守在您身边的。
voicelines.Idle - TW: 好好休息，局長。無論過去多久，我都會守在您身邊的。
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: You seem out of breath. Did you notice anything unusual?
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 呼吸が速くなっていますが、何か異常を察知したのですか？
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 호흡이 너무 가빠지셨는데, 뭔가 이상이라도 감지해내신 겁니까?
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 您的呼吸很急促，是察觉到什么异常了吗？
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 您的呼吸很急促，是察覺到什麼異常了嗎？
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: The Rust is indeed dangerous. But don't worry, I won't let any harm come to you—it's my duty.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 錆の川は確かに危険です。ですが安心してください。リスクは排除します——それが私の責務ですから。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 러스트 리버는 확실히 아주 위험합니다. 그래도 제가 국장님이 어떠한 위험도 맞닥뜨리지 않게 할 테니 안심해주시기 바랍니다. 그게 제 책임이니까요.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 锈河的确很凶险。不过请放心，我不会让您面对任何风险的——这是我的责任。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 鏽河的確很兇險。不過請放心，我不會讓您面對任何風險的——這是我的責任。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Traveling by horse might seem a bit... too much, but it's a gesture from Miss Faye. She insisted we uphold the prestige of the MBCC... I can't just disregard her kind intentions.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 馬に乗るなんて大袈裟ですが、フェイさんが特別に用意してくれたんです。「管理局のメンツのため」だと……その好意を無にするわけにはいきません。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 말을 타고 가는 게 좀 요란해 보이긴 하지만, 페이 씨가 관리국의 체면을 떨어뜨릴 순 없다고 특별히 제공한 겁니다… 저도 차마 그 호의를 거절할 수가 없었습니다.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 骑马出行是有些夸张了，但这是菲小姐特意提供的，她说不能丢了管理局的排面……我也不好辜负人家的好意。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 騎馬出行是有些誇張了，但這是菲小姐特意提供的，她說不能丟了管理局的排面……我也不好辜負人家的好意。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: It's time, Chief. I'm here to escort you to the party. Tonight, I'm the knight only for you.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 局長、約束の時間です。あなたをパーティーにお連れするために参りました——今日から私はあなたの専属騎士です。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 약속 시간이 다 되었습니다, 국장님. 제가 오늘 국장님의 전속 기사로서 연회에 모셔다드리러 왔습니다.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 约定时间到了，局长，我来接您赴宴——今天，我就是属于您的专属骑士。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 約定時間到了，局長，我來接您赴宴——今天，我就是屬於您的專屬騎士。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Would you like to pet him? It's okay, he's a gentle boy. Here, try riding him. Don't worry, I'll protect you.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 触ってみますか？大丈夫です、とても大人しいですから。乗ることもできますよ。ご心配なさらず。私がしっかり支えます。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 쓰다듬어 보고 싶으신가요? 괜찮아요. 온순한 친구거든요. 올라타 보셔도 돼요. 걱정하지 마세요. 제가 잘 붙잡고 있을 테니까요.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 您想要摸摸它吗？没关系，它很温顺，就算骑上去试试也可以的。别担心，我会好好地扶住您。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 您想要摸摸它嗎？沒關係，它很溫順，就算騎上去試試也可以的。別擔心，我會好好地扶住您。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: This look sacrifices a bit of functionality for aesthetics and does look a bit constricted and cumbersome... But rest assured, I will make sure you are unscathed no matter what happens.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: この服装は、美しさのために機能性を犠牲にしているので、少し窮屈で複雑なデザインですね……ですが、ご安心を。それでも私はすぐにあなたを守れますから。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 이 스타일은 겉모습을 위해 실용성을 포기해서 약간 어색하고 번거로워 보이네요… 하지만 안심하세요. 그래도 제가 국장님을 잘 보호해 드릴 수 있습니다.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 这个造型为了美观牺牲了些许功能性，看上去有点拘束繁琐……但请放心，我还是能够及时地保护好您。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 這個造型為了美觀犧牲了些許功能性，看上去有點拘束繁瑣……但請放心，我還是能夠及時地保護好您。
voicelines.Idle - EN: Shh, easy there... Are you feeling thirsty?
voicelines.Idle - JP: しー、静かに……喉が渇いたのか？
voicelines.Idle - KR: 쉿, 진정해… 물을 마시고 싶은 거야?
voicelines.Idle - CN: 嘘，安静一些……你是觉得渴了吗？
voicelines.Idle - TW: 噓，安靜一些……你是覺得渴了嗎？
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Ahem... Please don't mess up these decorations. It's a little time-consuming to wear them. After the party is over, I will take them off and give them to you, you can examine them however you want.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: ゴホン……服の装飾を乱さないでください。身に着けるのに手間がかかっているので。パーティーが終わったら、ゆっくり見ていただけるように全て外してあなたに手渡しますから。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 크흠… 장신구를 함부로 만지면 안 됩니다. 착용이 좀 번거로워서요. 연회가 끝나면 떼어드릴 테니까 그때 천천히 보십시오.
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 咳……请不要弄乱这些装饰，它们佩戴起来比较麻烦。等宴会结束之后，我会把它们摘下来，亲自送给您慢慢看。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 咳……請不要弄亂這些裝飾，它們佩戴起來比較麻煩。等宴會結束之後，我會把它們摘下來，親自送給您慢慢看。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: This outfit suits me? Thanks... I'm glad to know you like it.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: この服装は私に似合っているでしょうか？ありがとうございます……気に入っていただけたなら、それで十分です。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 이 옷이 제게 잘 어울리나요? 감사합니다… 국장님께서 마음에 드시니 그걸로 됐습니다.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 这身衣服很适合我？谢谢……只要您能喜欢就好。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 這身衣服很適合我？謝謝……只要您能喜歡就好。
voicelines.Level Up - EN: I've been honing my horsemanship. It won't be a bumpy ride, I promise.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 乗馬スキルが更に上がったので、あなたに乗り心地の悪さは感じさせません。
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 이제 말을 좀 더 잘 다룰 수 있게 됐어요. 승마감이 더 안정적일 겁니다.
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 我的骑术更精进了，不会让您感到颠簸。
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 我的騎術更精進了，不會讓您感到顛簸。
